products.name: basic-black
products.title: Basic Black
products.description: Basic Black Restique Multi-purpose Wrist Rest
products.fullDescription: Elevate your workspace with the Basic Black Restique Multipurpose Wrist Rest, the perfect blend of ergonomic support and personalized style. Designed for the modern professional who values both comfort and aesthetics, this innovative wrist rest is more than just an accessory – it's a statement piece for your desk. A versatile size at 360mm wide and 80mm high, Restique fits perfectly with most standard keyboards and desk setups. A premium materials crafted from high-quality leather and ergonomic foam, Restique offers a luxurious feel while maintaining durability for daily use.
